database.name: VIEW SCPP_PAYMENT_DETAIL_V
database.view: SELECT a.scpp_approvalpayment_id AS scpp_payment_detail_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, to_char('Y') AS isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.sspr_payroll_id, a.scpp_approvalpayment_id, a.dateapproval, a.datepayment FROM sspr_payroll b LEFT JOIN scpp_approvalpayment a ON b.sspr_payroll_id = a.sspr_payroll_id WHERE a.sspr_payroll_id IS NOT NULL
